name: Residence Inn by Marriott Marina del Rey
description: Connected to a Courtyard® hotel, the all-new Residence Inn Marina del Rey offers a unique experience in Marina del Rey, California. The fusion of these two signature Marriott® hotels allows you to take advantage of extra amenities like food & beverage options at Brizo Bar and Restaurant, Sam's Coffee Call and Terrace Deck; plus more event space to accommodate your needs. Set a pace that suits you at our hotel near Venice Beach attractions, businesses and activities. Whether you're in Marina del Rey for a few days, a few weeks or a few months, your daily routine matters. Spacious studios and one-bedroom hotel suites with separate living and sleeping areas offer a comfortable home away from home. A fully equipped kitchen makes dining in a snap, and complimentary Internet connects you to work and the outside world. Our complimentary hot breakfast starts mornings off right, and the hotel fitness center keeps you fit and active. Relax and stay focused and productive at Residence Inn Marina del Rey.Marriott

name: Hotel Bel-Air - Dorchester Collection
